metadata.description: She is Shiklah, undisputed Queen of the Monster Metropolis below Manhattan! In the world that was, she married Deadpool, the Merc with the Mouth...but nothing on Battleworld is quite as it was. Now, she commands the Howling Commandos: Werewolf By Night! Frankenstein’s Monster! The Living Mummy! Man-Thing! And Marcus the Centaur! What would her late husband think of that?
metadata.name: Mrs. Deadpool and the Howling Commandos
